descriptions: Student cannot identify any current representatives in the legislative branch.
Student identifies at least one representative with significant inaccuracies or provides information that is clearly incorrect.
Student identifies one or two representatives but with minor inaccuracies or omissions.
Student identifies all current representatives (House and Senate) from their district/state with mostly accurate information but may have a few minor omissions.
Student accurately identifies all current representatives from their district/state in the legislative branch with correct names and roles.
Student accurately identifies all current representatives and can also provide additional relevant information, such as party affiliation, key committees, or recent legislative actions.
Student demonstrates no understanding of the roles of representatives in the legislative branch.
Student shows minimal understanding, with significant misconceptions about the roles and responsibilities.
Student demonstrates some basic understanding of the role of a representative but lacks specifics.
Student understands the general roles and responsibilities of representatives, such as voting on laws and representing constituents.
Student clearly understands the roles of representatives, including their responsibilities in creating laws, representing constituents, and participating in committees.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the roles of representatives and can explain how they impact policy-making and address constituent needs, including examples.
Student does not use any resources to identify representatives.
Student attempts to use resources, but the resources are inappropriate or the student misinterprets the information.
Student uses a resource, but the resource is unreliable or outdated.
Student uses appropriate resources (e.g., official government websites) to identify representatives but may need some guidance.
Student independently and effectively uses reliable sources to accurately identify representatives.
Student uses a variety of reliable sources to confirm their identification of representatives and critically evaluates the information presented.
